summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 ADVENTURE 90FWS (NA).  AFTER TAKING THE PULL BEHIND TRAILER TO THE DEALER FOR THE RECALL REPAIR, THE MECHANIC STATED THAT THE FRACTURE HAD ALREADY OCCURRED.  THE CONTACT WAS ADVISED THAT SHE NEEDED TO REPLACE OR REPAIR THE DEFECT.  SHE DECIDED TO REPLACE THE UNIT BECAUSE IT WAS GOING TO COST ABOUT THE SAME AS REPAIRING THE UNIT.  THIS IS A BED TRAILER; THEREFORE, THERE WAS NO ENGINE OR MILEAGE INFORMATION.  THE RECALL NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN.
